property.name: output
property.description: The output returned from execution of the task.

property.name: release_templates
property.label: Release Templates
property.description: A list of release template names instantiate the sub-releases from in order.

property.name: release_titles
property.label: Release Titles
property.description: A list of release titles, if no title is specified the name of the template will be used for the release title.

property.name: create_gates
property.label: Create Gates?
property.description: Setting to determine if corresponding Gate tasks should be created for each sub-release.

property.name: parallel
property.label: Execute Parallel?
property.description: Setting to determine if the sub-releases should be executed in parallel (sequential is default).

property.name: release_variables
property.label: Release Variables
property.description: Release variables (String only) to be passed to the sub-release in list format. Example: KEY1=VAL1,KEY2=VAL2
